title: 40 min, bronze game. Helping Others Improve!

embed.description: Holy god damn it this was a tiring game. -- Twitter: https://twitter.com/YaseiDoubutsu Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YaseiDoubutsuXD/ Pateron: https://t.co/pQ5xovdbqe -- This is part of a series, where I try and help others go from Bronze to silver. Heck maybe even gold. Im not the one playing, Im spectating a game.

body:
Sorry that this one is long.

But here we have the new champion.

replies.body: how big was the file for the 40 min game ?

63.4 Gigs.

Took me 2 hours and a half to render and compress it.
Another 4 and a half to Upload.

WTF are you using.
2 and half hours wow, takes me 5 - 10 mins in Premier pro to render to h.264 in Adobe Media Encoder.

Fraps: for recording an average league game is 30-40 gigs.
But the quality is amazing.

And I use After Effects for rendering.

Green screen the middle where the video goes for the border in after effects, overlay it in Premier Pro and Ultra Key out the green.
This will cut your render time down heaps.

Haha. I watched it to the end. This is what lowl elo is every fucking game man. It doesn't matter how much you ping, the fucking clowns chase fucking kills over and over. 
Supp farming my jungle, top lane wasting fucking tp to try and kill the enemy top deep and gets caught.
You can lead a horse to water but you can't make it drink! If you even get a little bit behind in jg with deaths trying to save them from their dumb plays then they don't listen to you.
My game calling skills are not too bad at all having played for six seasons but at 39 years old and suffering cronic chest pain my mechanical skills suffer.
I end up on tilt watching them run like fucking lemmings into the enemy team.
My fucking pet hate is not having a sighstone on supp. I fucking hate it and it puts me on tilt hard.
It means as the jg I now have to buy a sighstone and become the supp. 
I have written a post about this but it got downvoted.
This match just shows how fucking bad it is a low elo.
Thanks for hopefully opening the eyes of some of the people on this forum to what a headfuck low elo is and why I get so fucking tilted and tocix watching dumb plays.
